title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Official
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Official 
Controls in relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal 
Origin) (Amendment) Regulations 2023. 

(2) The Principal Regulations, the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 244 of 2021), the European Union 
(Official Controls in relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of NonAnimal Origin) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 638 of 2021), 
the European Union (Official Controls in relation to Food Legislation) (Imports 
of Food of Non-Animal Origin) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2022 (S.I. 
No. 9 of 2022), the (No. 3) Regulations of 2022, the (No. 4) Regulations of 
2022 and these Regulations may be cited together as the European Union 
(Official Controls in relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of NonAnimal Origin) Regulations 2020 to 2023.

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 2. These Regulations come into operation on 16 February 2023.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations come into operation on 16 February 2023.

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations – 

“(No. 3) Regulations of 2022” means the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations 2022) (S.I. No. 328 of 2022); 

“(No. 4) Regulations of 2022” means the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) (No. 4) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 403 of 2022); 

“Principal Regulations” means the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 575 of 2020). 

1 OJ No. L 25, 27.1.2023, p. 36, as affected by Corrigendum of 2 February 2023 (OJ No. L 30, 2.2.2023, p. 33). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [50] 3

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 4. Regulation 2(1) (as amended by Regulation 2 of the (No. 4)
text_raw:
4. Regulation 2(1) (as amended by Regulation 2 of the (No. 4) 

Regulations of 2022) of the Principal Regulations is amended— 

(a) 

by substituting for the definition of “Annex I to EU Regulation 
2019/1793” the following: 

“‘Annex I to EU Regulation 2019/1793’ means Annex I to EU 
Regulation 2019/1793 as 
inserted by Article 1(2) of 
Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/174 of 26 
January 20231;”, 

(b) by substituting for the definition of “Annex II to EU Regulation 

2019/1793” the following: 

“‘Annex II to EU Regulation 2019/1793’ means Annex II to EU 
Regulation 2019/1793 as 
inserted by Article 1(2) of 
Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/174 of 26 
January 20231;”, 

(c) 

by substituting for the definition of “Annex IV to EU Regulation 
2019/1793” the following: 

“‘Annex IV to EU Regulation 2019/1793’ means Annex IV to 
EU Regulation 2019/1793 as inserted by Article 1(6) of 
Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2021/1900 of 27 
October 20212 and amended by Article 1(3) of Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/174 of 26 January 
20231;”, and 

(d) by substituting for the definition of “EU Regulation 2019/1793” 

the following: 

“‘EU Regulation 2019/1793’ means Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2019/1793 of 22 October 20193 as amended by 
Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/625 of 6 May 
20204, Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2021/608 of 
14 April 20215, Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2021/1900 of 27 October 20212, Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2022/913 of 30 May 20226 and Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/174 of 26 January 20231;”.

text_raw:
5. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Regulation 
24 (as amended by Regulation 6 of the (No. 3) Regulations of 2022) the 
following: 

“Transitional provision

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 24. Notwithstanding the provisions of Regulation 20(4), until 16
text_raw:
24. Notwithstanding the provisions of Regulation 20(4), until 16 
April 2023 an operator is not guilty of an offence where he or she 
imports into the State from a third country, without complying with the 
requirement in Regulation 8(1)(m)(ii)(II) or (IV), a consignment of— 

2 OJ No. L 387, 3.11.2021, p. 78. 
3 OJ No. L 277, 29.10.2019, p. 89. 
4 OJ No. L 144, 7.5.2020, p. 13. 
5 OJ No. L 129, 15.4.2021, p. 119. 
6 OJ No. L 158, 13.6.2022, p. 1. 

 
 
 4 [50] 

(a) groundnuts and products produced from groundnuts from 

Bolivia, 

(b) 

turnips (Brassica rapa ssp. rapa) from Lebanon, or 

(c) 

sesamum seeds from Nigeria, 

which have been dispatched from the country of origin, or from another 
third country if that country is different from the country of origin, before 
16 February 2023.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 February, 2023. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [50] 5

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Regulations give further effect to Commission Implementing Regulation 
(EU) 2023/174 of 26 January 2023 (as affected by Corrigendum of 2 February 
2023) amending Implementing Regulation (EU) 2019/1793 on the temporary 
increase of official controls and emergency measures governing the entry into 
the Union of certain goods from certain third countries implementing 
Regulations (EU) 2017/625 and (EC) No. 178/2002 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council. 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Official Controls in relation to 
Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 
(S.I. No. 575 of 2020) in the manner specified in these Regulations. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [50]
